title: Boudhanath Stupa
description: One of the largest stupas in the world and a UNESCO World Heritage Site, Boudhanath is a spiritual center for Tibetan Buddhism in Nepal.

title: Phewa Lake
description: A beautiful freshwater lake surrounded by mountains, offering boating, views of the Annapurna range, and a serene atmosphere.

title: Swayambhunath (Monkey Temple)
description: A sacred Buddhist pilgrimage site with panoramic views of Kathmandu Valley and a large population of monkeys.

title: Annapurna Circuit Trek
description: One of the world's greatest trekking routes, crossing multiple landscapes and high mountain passes including Thorong La.

title: Lumbini - Birthplace of Buddha
description: A sacred site and UNESCO World Heritage Site where Queen Maya Devi gave birth to Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha).

title: Mount Everest Base Camp
description: The world-famous trek to the base of the highest mountain on Earth, offering stunning Himalayan views and Sherpa culture.

title: Patan Durbar Square
description: A historical palace complex with rich Newari architecture, temples, and a museum showcasing Nepalese culture.
